string.name: about_summary
string.i: An application to help translating other android apps!

resources.string: %s already exists! Please use a different name.

Grarak: Kernel Adiutor (Code contributions)
Lennoard Silva: Portuguese (Brazilian) translations
FiestaLake: Korean translations
elea11: German translations
Andi Krisma: Indonesian translations
MONSTER_PC: Russian/Ukrainian translations
Kike Cabrera & Diego: Spanish translations
Mikesew1320: Amharic translations
sr093906: Chinese (simplified) Translations
Waldemar Stoczkowski: Polish translations
anilmavis: Turkish translations
Jakub Fabijan: Esperanto translations
Are you sure to delete current string.xml?
If you like to appreciate my work, please consider buying SmartPack Donation Package from PlayStore as it is really helpful to continue my projects more active, although it is not at all necessary.

If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this application entirely free, non-intrusive and without ads, please consider supporting the development in some way. Click here to know more. Thank you!
Please be careful with the special character\'s (%s) in your text!
You\'re entered some illegal characters! Your changes won\'t be saved.

Some character's are considered illegal in 'xml' format and are not acceptable! Please be noted that the entire text will be neglected (or even app crashes in the worst case) when an illegal character is detected! Some of the prohibited character's includes, but not limited to & - except for certain words < and > -except for certain cases such as , , , etc. Single (') or double (") quotation marks without a backward slash (\) in the front, etc.
\'%s\' is not a proper language string. Aborting!
You haven\'t imported any translation \'string\' file yet. Go to \'Settings\' menu to import one from \'sdcard\'!
You haven\'t imported any translation \'string\' file yet!

The Translator is an open-source application which is ready to accept contributions from the development community. Click here to check out the source code!
